steps.name: I am on the my profile page
I click the "request time off" button
I select "Annual leave" from the absence button
I select the start date and time
I select the end date and time
I input the reason for absence
I should see the message "Annual Leave requested"

name: Book Absence
description:
As a user I want to Log into BrightHR WebApp
I want to Book an Absence for myself
